channel.title: Need help with testscape source
channel.description:
In testscape source I cant add new things for example, new admins, I can only log on admins who already exist, I cant in testscape source add new npcs or new items, or instead of teleports emote or death sign if you are changing that message there is now oh dear you are dead that I had changed but I Dna death and there is still just oh dear you are dead and if I go to chapters, and it is their own account and change all skills in 99 and 15m xp save the log still is the same in that kind of Secured orso if so how to get that off will thank you.
TESTSCAPE SOURCE@@@!

item.title: Need help with testscape source
item.dc:creator: @sekava sekava
item.description:
@sekava wrote:

I can solve that admin/mod problem. First of search for

start of modeator

Under it should be
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“NAME”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

Put you name for NAME and you have owner rights for server. To add admins, simply make this
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ADMINNAME”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}

Replace ADMINNAME with name of admin you adding. For modeator, just replace playerRights = 2
with playerRights = 1. Tell if any probs

What you mean by adding new items

Read full topic
